attributes.action: allow the sale of miniature elephants created from the genetics of those found on Milan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the recent rejection of the petition by Jack Smithies to allow normal-sized elephants as pets, on perfectly sensible grounds of their size and care being almost impossible to fulfill by the average Briton, I hereby put forward that in the interest of benefits for British Children and Adults alike, we should replicate the 'cloning wooly mammoths' experiment with the miniature elephant fossils recently found in Milan. Government funding should immediately be supplied to allow research into the plausability of this.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
